SEARCH
Package control

Class CampController

Object
CampController
public class CampController extends Object
Static control class for interfacing with the UI classes to handle all requests regarding camps.

These include:
1) Creation, edit and deletion of camps
2) Filtering and returning ArrayList of camps based on different scenarios
3) adding and removing signups for a Camp

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      public static void createCamp(String name, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate regCloseDate, Faculty openToFaculty, String location, int totalSlots, int commSlots, String description, boolean visibleToStudents) throws Exception
      creates a camp.
      Only staff can do create a camp.
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Parameters:
      name -
      startDate -
      endDate - can be same as startDate to indicate a day camp
      regCloseDate - cannot be after startDate
      openToFaculty - which school this camp is for, can be for whole NTU
      location -
      totalSlots - both attendees and committee members
      commSlots - committee member slots
      description -
      visibleToStudents - whether the camp can be seen by students/accepting signups
      Throws:
      Exception

    • editCamp

      public static void editCamp(Camp camp, String name, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate regCloseDate, Faculty openToFaculty, String location, int totalSlots, int commSlots, String description, boolean visibleToStudents) throws Exception
      Edits a camp after creation
      Only staff can edit a camp.
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Checks if a camp already has signups. If yes, the camp cannot be set to invisible or turned off
      Parameters:
      name -
      startDate -
      endDate - can be same as startDate to indicate a day camp
      regCloseDate - cannot be after startDate
      openToFaculty - which school this camp is for, can be for whole NTU
      location -
      totalSlots - both attendees and committee members
      commSlots - committee member slots
      description -
      visibleToStudents - whether the camp can be seen by students/accepting signups
      Throws:
      Exception

    • deleteCamp

      public static void deleteCamp(Camp deletingCamp) throws Exception
      Deletes a camp.
      Only staff can delete a camp
      Checks if a camp already has signups. If yes, the camp cannot be deleted
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Parameters:
      deletingCamp - the camp to be deleted
      Throws:
      Exception - when the camp already has signups
      Exception - when camp to be deleted cannot be found

    • getCreatedCamps

      public static ArrayList<Camp> getCreatedCamps() throws Exception
      Gets the list of camps the staff has created.
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Returns:
      camps ArrayList
      Throws:
      Exception - when the current user is not a staff

    • getAvailableCamps

      public static ArrayList<Camp> getAvailableCamps()
      Gets list of camps available camps according to user type.
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Staff can see all the camps in the system.

      CommitteeMembers and Students can only see if
      1) Its visibility is turned on for students
      2) Today's date is before the registration close date
      3) The camp is meant for his/her faculty or open to the whole school

      Returns:
      camps ArrayList

    • getSignedUpCamps

      public static ArrayList<Camp> getSignedUpCamps()
      Gets list of camps a student or committee member has signed up.
      If he/she is a commitee member, add the camp he/she is in-charge-of to the list
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Returns:
      camps ArrayList

    • removeAttendee

      public static void removeAttendee(Camp camp)
      Removes an attendee from list of attendees of a Camp
      Also adds the attendee to a blacklist so he/she will not be able to register for this camp again
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Parameters:
      camp - the camp he/she is withdrawing from

    • registerAttendee

      public static void registerAttendee(Camp camp) throws Exception
      Registers an attendee for a Camp by adding current User to the list
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      Student or commitee member can only register if
      1. He/she is not in the blacklist, ie have not withdrew from this camp before
      2. He/she is not already an attendee
      3. He/she is not already a committee member
      4. This Camp's start and end date do not overlap with any of his/her existing camps
      Parameters:
      camp -
      Throws:
      Exception - when he/she is in blacklist
      Exception - when he/she is already an attendee
      Exception - when he/she is already a commitee
      Exception - when the dates clashes

    • registerCommittee

      public static void registerCommittee(Camp camp) throws Exception
      Registers a committee member for a Camp
      Interfaces with DataController which stores all the run-time data.
      can only register if
      1. He/she is not in the blacklist, ie have not withdrew from this camp before
      2. He/she is not already an attendee
      3. He/she is not already a committee member
      4. This Camp's start and end date do not overlap with any of his/her existing camps
      Also converts him/her from a Student to a CommitteeMember
      Parameters:
      camp -
      Throws:
      Exception - when he/she is in blacklist
      Exception - when he/she is already an attendee
      Exception - when he/she is already a commitee
      Exception - when the dates clashes
